Package org.hps.recon.tracking.gbl Description

Generalized Broken Lines (GBL) track fitting algorithm, originally ported from C++

This package uses Java Native Access (JNA) to access the GBL C++ library compiled on the host machine.

GBL Source Repository

GBL Documentation
